name: Pumpykins
description:
Be a pumpkin creature for a minute :)

(This project is more of a movement/menu simulator than a game right now)

Keyboard Controls:

  • Movement: WASD / Arrow keys
  • Sprint: Z
  • Bury: X (not working)

Remote Controls:

  • Movement: Joystick
  • Sprint: Right Bumper
  • Bury: Left Bumper (not working)
